hero.hero.p: I am a software engineer and Front-End developer. I like to create things related to web development and constantly learn new technologies.

about.about.p1: Hello!!, my name is Luis Muñoz and I am a Software Engineer focused on Front-End Development, I finished my studies at the college and I am looking to gain experience work, I currently live in Chile.
about.about.p2: I like to build websites using the tools in the which I have knowledge and be constantly training myself in new technologies.
about.about.p3: Today I am studying Node and Express to be able to be a Full Stack Developer.
about.about.p4: These are some technologies in which I have knowledge and I am also learning:

experience.experience.p1: I worked with a development team performing monitoring tasks such as reporting events, leading meetings, working with a team as well as coordinating them and verifying the achievement of objectives.
experience.experience.p2: I also did design and redesign of websites to improve navigation and visual appeal, I also did web page creation tasks using tools like Html, Css, Bootstrap and JavaScript.
experience.experience.p4: Meeting Leadership · Team Leadership · Training · Software Development  · Teamwork

contact.contact.p: I am currently looking for my first job and I am exploring opportunities, any questions do not hesitate to contact me, I will respond as quickly as possible!!!

proyect.proyect.card1.p3: Veterinary administrator project that has localstore, made with React, Vite and Tailwindcss.
proyect.proyect.card2.p3: Cryptocurrency quote app, made with React and consuming the CryptoCompare API.
proyect.proyect.card3.p3: Gif search app, made in Vite with React and consuming the GIPHY Developers API.
